original_text: They have corrupted themselves, their spot is not the spot of his children: they are a perverse and crooked generation.
korean_text: 그들이 여호와를 향하여 악을 행하니 하나님의 자녀가 아니요 흠이 있고 삐뚤어진 세대로다

sentences.original_text: their spot is not the spot of his children
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 흠은 그의 자녀들의 흠이 아니며

sentences.original_text: they are a perverse and crooked generation
